title: Chart: Elon Musk is spurring growth at Mastodon
description: A chart shows Mastodon user growth as of December 2022 since Elon Musk purchased Twitter in October.

title: Girl Scout mom kicked out of Radio City and barred from seeing Rockettes after facial recognition tech identified her
description: An attorney from a law firm suing the parent company of Radio City Music Hall was kicked out of the venue while trying to see a Rockettes performance with her

title: How Tory Lanez trial bloggers are shaping the conversation around Megan Thee Stallion
description: Misinformation about Megan Thee Stallion is going viral as the Tory Lanez trial begins.

title: Artists in Cuba find themselves blocked   from NFT trading sites

title: Elon Musk says he will resign as Twitter's CEO when he finds a replacement
description: Elon Musk will step down as Twitter’s chief executive after he finds someone “foolish” enough to replace him, he said Tuesday.
